name: Molybdenum Plate Armor Upgrades
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ Upgrade your Molybdenum Plate Armor (from Biodomes) with Black Molybdenum-Matrix of Xan and White Molybdenum-Matrix of Xan from Inside the Machine. #L "Jathos' Molybdenum Plate Vest" "252001" #L "Kegern's Molybdenum Plate Helmet" "252017" #L "Jathos' Molybdenum Plate Boots" "252002" #L "Kegern's Molybdenum Plate Gloves" "252018" #L "Black Molybdenum-Matrix of Xan" "272458" #L "White Molybdenum-Matrix of Xan" "272459" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Jathos' Molybdenum Plate Vest + Black Molybdenum-Matrix of Xan = #L "Enhanced Jathos' Molybdenum Plate Vest" "272444" Skills: | ? | Kegern's Molybdenum Plate Helmet + Black Molybdenum-Matrix of Xan = #L "Enhanced Kegern's Molybdenum Plate Helmet" "272454" Skills: | ? | Note: Black Molybdenum-Matrix of Xan is used to upgrade both types of armor, Kegern's as well as Jathos, but only vest and helmet pieces. And if you have already upgraded helmet with Action Probability Estimator from Apf, you won't be able to do this combine. ------------------------------ Jathos' Molybdenum Plate Boots + White Molybdenum-Matrix of Xan = #L "Enhanced Jathos' Molybdenum Plate Boots" "272445" Skills: | ? | Kegern's Molybdenum Plate Gloves + White Molybdenum-Matrix of Xan = #L "Enhanced Kegern's Molybdenum Plate Gloves" "272453" Skills: | ? | Note: White Molybdenum-Matrix of Xan is used to upgrade both types of armor, Kegern's as well as Jathos, but only boots, gloves, sleeves and pant pieces.
